name: commodities-compass
description: Monorepo for Commodities Compass - Business Intelligence for commodities trading

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && poetry install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && poetry run black . && poetry run isort .
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
